WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
I have a problem with UIA support of the CellTemplate contained controls (e.g. TextBox, ComboBox, ..) because I can not find them in the UIA-Tree. 
In the WinForms-DataGridView it is possible to search for the "Editing Control" to get the contained control when it is in editing mode. Why WPF does not support that?
 
If more infos needed or something is unclear please ask.

Comments.Message: This is a known issue and we are discussing it.  We will update whenever possible.
